overview:
I have always been in love with technology and the tone of innovation it brings on every step, without it things like the Internet, Social Media, the iPad and Android OS would’ve not happened. So today instead of reading about the possibility we are living it and using it every day.

From that point I became a passionate Entrepreneur, enthusiastic Social Media Strategist and a dedicated Web Technology Expert. Joined the Computer Engineering realm in 2000, and then continued my education in Computer Science & Business in 2005.

In 2005 launched The Logica, LLC, which enabled me to developed new businesses from concept to execution, utilizing the web as a solid structured platform reshaping old business models with new ones full of more opportunities and profitable channels across wide demographics in a global scale.

Running on a 1.57 billion-watt battery that never stops powered by Creative Thinking…

Specialties Web Architecture, Design, Creative Business Logistics, Social Engagement, Google, Agile Development, Semantic Web Architect, Mobile Application Development, Business Model Developer, Marketing, Photography
